# INUIHostedViewContext.mapsCard

**Case**

A place card in Maps. This value indicates that your content is being displayed from Maps.

## Declaration

```swift
case mapsCard
```

## Constants

- **INUIHostedViewContext.siriSnippet**: A Siri result snippet. This value indicates that your content is being displayed from the Siri interaction interface.

items.description: A Siri result snippet. This value indicates that your content is being displayed from the Siri interaction interface.
